event: First synthetic fibers observed in jellyfish tentacles (Sargasso Sea)
description: of sampled jellyfish showed entanglement or ingestion of synthetic fragments floating in mid-ocean gyres.
source: Synthetic fiber runoff from early plastic textiles and maritime waste.

source: Accumulated microplastic particles from urban waste and degraded packaging materials.
